TopicTitle: For high resolution screens, the font size is often still too small

Articles.Content:
I was hoping 1.2 would fix this...

My 13" laptop screen has a resolution of 3800 by 1800.  I can adjust UI_Scale to 200% to fix most of KSP so it is somewhat normal. However, I can't find a way to increase the font size for things like the apoapsis and periapsis data on the map screen.  They are fairly hard to read.

Is there a way to change this font size?
